mapper.select: SELECT d.dept_name, e.dept_no, e.emp_name, e.emp_id, e.emp_no, e.emp_position, e.emp_sal, to_char(emp_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') emp_date, e.emp_tel, e.emp_phone, to_char(emp_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') emp_birth, e.emp_address FROM employee e, department d WHERE e.emp_no = #{emp_no} and e.dept_no = d.dept_no
